page.title: 07TADCASTER CARNIVAL
page.content: Every year in Tadcaster there is a carnival with brigtly coloured floats representing things.Carnival time is a nice time ,some floats throw sweets out ,there are dancers and bands,stalls,competitions,raffles, exhibitions,games and many other things. The parade of floats is lead by the Carnival Queen riding on Samuel Smith's dray pulled by two shire horses. If you are lucky enough you can get on a float with school or a club.I remember when I was picked to go on float with school.It was called the Ugly Bug Ball .I was a snail. It was cold that day I was glad my costume was made out thick material. Even though it was cold I enjoyed it all the same .There was orange to drink afterwards and wine for the grownups.
